improvements: Increase global contrast by roughly 20% and lower the black point to remove the hazy, washed-out appearance
Reduce highlights by 15-20% to recover texture detail in the dog's white fur which is currently overexposed
Apply a moderate sharpening mask specifically to the dog's eyes and snout to enhance focus
Boost vibrance by 10% to make the greens in the grass pop without oversaturating the subject
critiques.notes: The composition excellently uses negative space to imply motion, capturing a great energetic moment. However, the image currently suffers from a lack of dynamic range and softness; restoring contrast and highlight detail is essential to separate the subject from the background and define the fur texture.

improvements: Increase shutter speed to 1/1000s or faster to eliminate motion blur in the dog's fur and legs
Boost contrast by 15-20% to add depth and definition to the white fur against the green background
Increase sharpness and clarity by 25-30 points to bring out detail in the facial features and coat texture
Crop tighter following rule of thirds, placing the dog's face in the right third with more space in front for movement direction
critiques.notes: The image captures a joyful moment with good natural lighting and pleasant composition. However, slight motion blur reduces sharpness, and the flat contrast makes the white subject blend somewhat with the background. The framing could be improved to better emphasize direction of movement and create more dynamic visual tension.

summary: [GEMINI] The composition excellently uses negative space to imply motion, capturing a great energetic moment. The framing could be improved to better emphasize direction of movement and create more dynamic visual tension.
